mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(qnaNo, qnaTitle, qnaContent, nickname, category, qnaDate, status) values (qna_ID.nextval, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{nickname}, #{category}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select qnaNo, qnaTitle, qnaContent, nickname, category, qnaDate, answerContent, status from qna where qnaNo = #{qnaNo}
select qnaNo, qnaTitle, qnaDate from qna order by qnaNo desc
select count(qnaNo) from qna where qnaNo > 0

SELECT qnaNo, category, qnaTitle, nickname, qnaDate, status FROM (SELECT qnaNo, category, qnaTitle, nickname, qnaDate, status, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY qnaNo DESC) AS RNUM FROM qna) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY qnaNo DESC
mapper.update: update qna set answerContent = #{answerContent}, status = 1 where qnaNo = #{qnaNo}
